options.content: <mark>TIPS</mark>: The Ingress-controller setting "spec.hostNetwork=true" is not supported.

list.definition: {"sql":"SELECT pod_cluster as `value`, pod_cluster as `display_name` FROM `vtap_flow_port.1m` WHERE  time >= ${__from:date:seconds} AND time <= ${__to:date:seconds} GROUP BY `value` LIMIT 999999999999","useAny":true,"useDisabled":false}
list.name: cluster

query.sql: SELECT pod_cluster as `value`, pod_cluster as `display_name` FROM `vtap_flow_port.1m` WHERE  time >= ${__from:date:seconds} AND time <= ${__to:date:seconds} GROUP BY `value` LIMIT 999999999999

list.definition: {"database":"flow_metrics","sql":"SELECT pod_group AS value , pod_group AS display_name FROM `vtap_app_port.1m` WHERE pod_cluster IN (${cluster:singlequote})  AND pod_group LIKE '$ingress_wildcard'  GROUP BY `value`"}
list.name: ingress_workload

query.sql: SELECT pod_group AS value , pod_group AS display_name FROM `vtap_app_port.1m` WHERE pod_cluster IN (${cluster:singlequote})  AND pod_group LIKE '$ingress_wildcard'  GROUP BY `value`
